abstract: NFL Fast Forward column on how league officials chose to handle fallout from heated confrontation between Detroit Lions coach Jim Schwartz and San Francisco 49ers coach Jim Harbaugh that reminded many of a junior high school playground fight.
snippet: After a postgame handshake between opposing coaches almost ignited a brawl on Sunday, the N.F.L. has to decide whether etiquette still has a place in a violent game.
lead_paragraph: After a postgame handshake between opposing coaches almost ignited a brawl on Sunday, the N.F.L. has to decide whether etiquette still has a place in a violent game.

headline.main: Coaches Throw No Punches and Earn No Penalties
headline.seo: When a Handshake Is Unsportsmanlike Conduct - N.F.L. Fast Forward
headline.print_headline: Coaches Throw No Punches and Earn No Penalties
